alert.note: Alert for Griggs; Nelson (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 7:08PM CDT until June 24 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Nelson County in northeastern North Dakota... Griggs County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kensal, or 38 miles northwest of Valley City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sutton around 725 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Revere, Jessie and Cooperstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
